languages.text: "Не недооценивайте силу желания губернатора Драйвстема угодить Вашей Светлости. В данную секунду тысячи ваших подданных разбирают завалы, отмывают кровавые пятна, метут улицы и стаскивают трупы в нижние сектора".

"Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."
languages.original_text: "Не недооценивайте силу желания губернатора Драйвстема угодить Вашей Светлости. В данную секунду тысячи ваших подданных разбирают завалы, отмывают кровавые пятна, метут улицы и стаскивают трупы в нижние сектора".

traits.locale_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

"Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

"Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

"Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

languages.text: 「陛下の歓心を買おうというドライブステム総督の熱意は過小評価できません。今この瞬間にも、何千という陛下の臣下ががれきを取り除き、血のしみを洗い流し、道を掃き清め、遺体を低層区域に運んでいるのです」
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の歓心を買おうというドライブステム総督の熱意は過小評価できません。今この瞬間にも、何千という陛下の臣下ががれきを取り除き、血のしみを洗い流し、道を掃き清め、遺体を低層区域に運んでいるのです」

languages.text: “千万不要低估德莱夫斯塔总督讨您欢心的渴望，大人。此时此刻，您的无数臣民正在忙着清理废墟、冲刷血迹、打扫街道、把尸体运到巢都底层。”
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

traits.locale_text: “千万不要低估德莱夫斯塔总督讨您欢心的渴望，大人。此时此刻，您的无数臣民正在忙着清理废墟、冲刷血迹、打扫街道、把尸体运到巢都底层。”

languages.text: «No subestime los deseos del gobernador Drivestem de ganarse su favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Mientras hablamos, miles de sus súbditos están quitando escombros, lavando manchas de sangre, barriendo las calles y transportando los cadáveres a los sectores inferiores».
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

traits.locale_text: «No subestime los deseos del gobernador Drivestem de ganarse su favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Mientras hablamos, miles de sus súbditos están quitando escombros, lavando manchas de sangre, barriendo las calles y transportando los cadáveres a los sectores inferiores».

languages.text: « Ne sous-estimez pas le désir du gouverneur Drivestem de gagner les faveurs de Votre Seigneurie. En ce moment même, des milliers de vos sujets déblaient les décombres, nettoient les taches de sang, balaient les rues et transportent les cadavres dans les secteurs inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

traits.locale_text: « Ne sous-estimez pas le désir du gouverneur Drivestem de gagner les faveurs de Votre Seigneurie. En ce moment même, des milliers de vos sujets déblaient les décombres, nettoient les taches de sang, balaient les rues et transportent les cadavres dans les secteurs inférieurs. »

languages.text: "Unterschätzt nicht den Wunsch von Gouverneur Drivestem, die Gunst Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu erringen. In diesem Augenblick räumen Tausende Eurer Untertanen Schutt weg, entfernen Blutspuren, fegen die Straßen und transportieren Leichen in die unteren Sektoren."
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

traits.locale_text: "Unterschätzt nicht den Wunsch von Gouverneur Drivestem, die Gunst Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu erringen. In diesem Augenblick räumen Tausende Eurer Untertanen Schutt weg, entfernen Blutflecken, fegen die Straßen und transportieren Leichen in die unteren Sektoren."

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem'in {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin gözüne girme arzusunu küçümsemeyin. Şu anda binlerce kulunuz molozları temizliyor, kan lekelerini yıkıyor, sokakları süpürüyor ve cesetleri alt sektörlere taşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate Governor Drivestem's desire to find favour with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At this very moment, thousands of your subjects are clearing rubble, washing away bloodstains, sweeping the streets, and transporting corpses to the lower sectors."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem'in {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin gözüne girme arzusunu küçümsemeyin. Şu anda binlerce kulunuz molozları temizliyor, kan lekelerini yıkıyor, sokakları süpürüyor ve cesetleri alt sektörlere taşıyor."
